author: Mario Aguado
comment: Are 2 main things that are really a must be in this app: allow to send from Google Maps a location directly to the Car. The travel log should show and calculate the real travel not point to point straight since the distance is wrong. Please make this happens.

author: Dirk Janssen
comment: I receive data, see  where the car is temprature etc. But cannot send information to the car, start heater  honk n flash etc. It makes the app rather useless

author: Gabriel Adeyemi
comment: The app seems not to get a respond signal from the car when a command has been executed. E.g. The app get stuck on "starting heater". One has to kill the app and restart to see that the heater is on.

author: LaTiNo Diaz
comment: Works great albeit a bit slow when sending commands. Would get 5 stars if there was support for Google Assistant 😁

author: Mika Korhonen
comment: Freezes, wrong status, fix it please.

author: Viktor Zsigo
comment: Det går ju inte att programmera värmen, har inte fungerat på flera veckor, skärpning!!!

author: Marius Toleikis
comment: does exactly what I need...love it

author: morgan rody
comment: Can't believe you expect people to pay for an app that, 1) is very very slow to respond 2) requires I set the heater timer TWICE every time 3) tells me the windows are open when they are clearly not 4) doesn't really do anything amazing and the options volvo has... are buggy AF. Look at teslas app, match that, then maybe I'll pay for this.

author: Gudrun Johnson
comment: I can never get the remote start. The only way I know it is kinda working is I do get alerts if I leave it unlocked.

author: Roger Henderson
comment: Latest version still excessively slow to send/receive from car - what is it doing? Volvo Sensus in the car is pretty poor and slow too. Who writes the software for Volvo? It can't be professionals!

author: Sheila Magnus
comment: I went from two stars to five. Great improvements to this app. Having no difficulties remotely starting the car or sending an address to the navigation. I must use this app about 10-15 times a day. Keep it up.

author: Dan Stewart
comment: Works for me 95% of the time. Every now and again, it'll say something is open when it's not. But those are few and far between.

author: shyam mousham
comment: Response time is slow. Works though.
Needs a way to roll up the windows. Make it accessible from a notification, like the locks.

author: Hans-Robert Dalen
comment: Works... No issues, S60 D3 2012..

author: Rubal Kundra
comment: Amazing work

author: Frank Salimans
comment: In NL it works fine with my S60 and the app is free. My car gets warm when needed and I like the unlocked messages. The integration with the navigation system is great! I submit destinations from my calendar directly to my car. I like it.

author: Stephen Shank
comment: Unable to warm car from the app.  The only reason I'd ever wish to have this app and this is not  an option. As others have mentioned owners must enter a freezing yet started car in winter.

author: Leonard Gagiu
comment: I getting a "TECHNICAL ERROR" when i tried to delete/ edit the hours to charge the hybrid batteries. So i can't charge in out of those hours. That happened 3 weeks ago and even i called to report the issues still not fix it. Invest more in Techichal support or someone with a clue in what they do.  Shame on you Volvo.

author: Phil Kermeen
comment: Slowly improving, still occasionally fails to start pre conditioning and would be great to control when the charging of the hybrid battery occurs, I hear bmw do it well😉
After paying a huge sum for this technologically bug filled suv they put an ap like this out and they want you to pay for it.

author: Sathish Kumar
comment: not without limitations mentioned by others - precondition won't work, lag in showing locked status. but as someone working in tech industry all new tech it takes time to fully understand the pros and cons of ever changing protocols and on top you have security to consider. but Volvo are doing great, they are staying ahead in the game.

author: Antti Kivi
comment: In general I think that I could say that the app is great but the major drawback is that as soon the winter comes along and you want to start up your heater in the car via the app it does not work and you receives the standard error message i.e. An unspecified error occurred on the server. Please try again.  Sorry to say but every winter the same, I wonder if the competitors are as bad as this? anyone who knows?  Please let me know

author: Luca Lafera
comment: 2016 V60: Apps usually cost between 1 and $5CAD.. This one costs $200CAD a year and is unreliable and lacks functionality.. So happy you don't build cars like you do apps.

author: Gary Coke
comment: For the HYBRID it's extremely limited.  Gives u basic information and u can lock and unlock after a significant delay.  You get a journal.  But that's it....It's that worth $10 a month?  I bought it cause the salesman said I could precondition the car.  Only true if it's plugged in!  I feel hoodwinked!

author: Isidro Cruz
comment: It's winter and i have to enter a freezing vehicle. I would have gone with another vehicle if I knew this before hand. After all the complaints preconditioning still not functional.

author: michelle p
comment: I love that it sends me reminders.  locking and unlocking from a distance is also a plus.  app has been a little glitchy lately for some reason, but over all, it's helpful.

author: Salem
comment: Needs a refresh button or a indicator that the app is syncing. The parking climate timer is a little buggy, it turns itself off for no reason.

author: John Elliott
comment: Getting better but temperature calculation is wrong. Doing some odd math and getting values swapped and +/- swapped.

author: Lorenzo Kucaric
comment: Worthless if you have a T8. Requiring On Call is a joke.
Overall its okay but it would be great to see some more functionality. Please add an option for checking battery charge levels. Cheers.

author: Francus Simonetti
comment: When wlll the samsumg gear s3 with Tizen be supported?

author: Wolfram Schlich
comment: Widget for parking heater is missing!

author: CJ fusion
comment: Easy ,helpful.nothing happier

author: Dmitriy Fridlyand
comment: 2017 XC90. Climate /preconditioning doesn't work. Remote start works 50% of the time with long delays, and doesn't start conditioning, so not sure of the purpose anyways. Not mentioning that I had to call volvo to get pin, otherwise you cannot install app.
Does as advertised, albeit with a delay. Relatively unreliable, as sometimes it fails to communicate with your vehicle, or at least that it has failed to communicate with your car.

author: Sahak Margossian
comment: I just updated the app and it stopped working. It keeps saying that the connection times out. This is really frustrating

author: Michael Ekstrom
comment: Man kan inte redigera eller skapa egna kategorier i körjournalen. Bilen har en termometer, men appen visar temperatur från extern källa. Det betyder att när bilen står inomhus så visar appen kanske -20' när det i själva verket är +15' där bilen står. Parkeringsvärmaren visar alltid "Ready". Man vet inte om den är aktiv eller inte. Man ser varken bränslenivå eller laddningsgrad, vilket påverkar om värmaren kommer att starta eller inte. Du vet alltså inte om du möts av en iskall bil eller om värmaren har kunnat göra sitt jobb. Däremot verkar det vara jäkligt viktigt att visa spolarnivå...

author: stax
comment: Rip off!
very good app.
